intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive! Revolutionary radar system for tactical advantage! Direct tank control with RPG-7 attacks on snowy battlefields!
description:
The newly equipped radar system and direct tank control realize unprecedented strategic tank battles! Massive tank warfare unfolds on beautiful, realistic snow-covered battlefields using multiple tanks! On the battlefield, board tanks to control armored vehicles directly and crush enemy positions with 120mm main guns. While tracking enemy positions with radar, devastating RPG-7 anti-tank rocket attacks are also possible! Dynamic combat combining infantry and tanks creates an unparalleled battlefield experience on this new snowy stage!

・Revolutionary radar system positioned at the bottom-left of the screen instantly identifies enemy tank and infantry positions, securing tactical victory!
・Direct tank operation utilizing dramatically increased tank numbers delivers unprecedented large-scale tank warfare intensity!
・Complete tank control system boarding tanks directly provides an immersive tank battle experience!
・Beautiful, photorealistic snow-covered battlefields feature spectacular snow and blizzard effects when shells impact!
・Innovative tank-infantry combinations allow seamless switching between 120mm cannon attacks and RPG-7 anti-tank assaults!
・Four specialist classes each with unique weapons realize diverse combat styles!
・Ultra-high-definition snowy graphics, 3D audio, and physics engines authentically reproduce tank roars, explosions, and blizzards!
・Radar-linked intuitive controls enable tank operation enjoyment from beginners to experts!
・3D physics engines with weighty tank control and explosive impact completely reproduce overwhelming tank physics calculations!
・Diverse game modes prepared including various snowy battlefield missions!
・Challenge extreme Special Combat missions as elite international special forces!

Radar systems pioneering a new era of tank warfare! Overwhelming combat experience directly controlling multiple tanks across blizzard-ravaged arctic battlefields. Photorealistic snowy graphics, strategic radar displays, and 120mm artillery combined with RPG-7 attacks create unprecedented immersion! Experience the pinnacle of tank control in this ultimately evolved snowy battlefield FPS!

Synopsis
Harsh winter winds race across snowfields where silver-white terrain extends endlessly across arctic battlefields. The next-generation tactical system "Tempest Radar," secretly developed by the three-nation military alliance "Northern Pact," pulses at the heart of this frozen fortress city. They've completed innovative tank command systems, deploying the unmanned tank corps "Ice Storm." From massive bases covered in snow and ice, they steadily advance their global conquest ambitions.

International peacekeeping forces have dispatched next-generation special forces to arctic regions as an emergency response. You step onto blizzard-swept battlefields as a member of these elite troops.

Utilize cutting-edge radar systems to command multiple tanks and seize snowy dominance. From tank cockpits, pulverize enemy positions with 120mm guns and witness spectacular snow explosion effects when shells detonate on snow surfaces. Alternatively, aim RPG-7s to ignite enemy steel behemoths, blooming shell flowers across pure white snowfields. Track enemy shadows shown by tactical radar to dominate massive tank battles, or reverse the tide with devastating anti-tank attacks. In blizzard-swept arctic battlefields, your choices determine humanity's destiny!
